root.name: Three Wonders
root.description: Midnight Wanderers: Quest for the Chariot - A platformer, like other Capcom titles such as Mega Man and Strider. The player controls a kid named Lou and his comrade, Siva, to basically run, climb, and shoot at enemies.Chariot: Adventure through the Sky - A basic shoot-'em up game featuring the characters from Midnight Wanderers, but in a Gradius-esque game.Don't Pull - A puzzle game similar to games like the Eggerland series and Pengo that involves pushing blocks to crush monsters.Three Wonders was ported in 1998 to the Sega Saturn and PlayStation. Â Capcom rereleased this collection of games in 2006 onto Capcom Classics Collection Vol. 2 on the PlayStation 2 and Xbox and Capcom Classics Collection Remixed on the PSP.
